member.name: M:bosch_api.Controllers.CameraController.GetAllCameras(System.Int32)
member.summary: GetAllSites API. Returns all cameras info.
member.remarks:
Sample request:
GET /getallcameras?siteid=1
Sample response:
{ "respcode": 1200, "description": "Successful", "cameras": [ { "cameraId": 1, "cameraName": "Camera at Entrance", "cameraIP": "192.168.1.191", "model": "Bosch", "additionalDetail": "", "GateId": 1 }, { ... } ... ] }
Response codes: 1200 = "Successful" 1201 = "Error"

member.name: M:bosch_api.Controllers.CameraController.AddNewEntry(System.Int32)
member.remarks:
Sample request:
GET /addnewentry?cameraid=1
Sample response:
{ "respcode": 1200, }
Response codes: 1200 = "Successful" 1201 = "Error"

member.name: M:bosch_api.Controllers.CameraController.AddNewExit(System.Int32)
member.remarks:
Sample request:
GET /addnewexit?cameraid=1
Sample response:
{ "respcode": 1200 }
Response codes: 1200 = "Successful" 1201 = "Error"

member.name: M:bosch_api.Controllers.CameraController.GetLatestCapture
member.summary: GetLatestCapture API. Get the latest screen capture.
member.remarks:
Sample request:
GET /getlatestcapture?cameraid=1
Sample response: Latest Captured picture
Response codes: 1200 = "Successful" 1201 = "Error"

member.name: M:bosch_api.Controllers.CameraController.GetLatestAlarmLevel(System.Int32)
member.remarks:
Sample request:
GET /getlatestalarmlevel?cameraid=1
Sample response:
{ "respcode": 1200, "timestamp": "2020-09-13T14:47:25", "level": "2" }
Response codes: 1200 = "Successful" 1201 = "Error"

member.name: M:bosch_api.Controllers.SiteController.GetAllSites
member.summary: GetAllSites API. Returns all sites info.
